title: The Federal.... NEW North End Jr. 1 Beds - W/D in UNIT & CENTRAL AIR
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 226540505', 'Rent: $2,300 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'WE HAVE THE LARGEST EXCLUSIVE RENTAL INVENTORY IN THE NORTH END.', 'Core Property Group – 278 North Street Boston, MA 02113 - Open 7 Days a Week', 'MONEY DUE UP FRONT', 'FIRST MONTH: $2300', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT:  $2300', 'BROKER FEE: $2300', 'Brand New Construction at the 50 yd line of Hanover Street in Boston’s Historic North End', 'THESE UNITS MUST BE SEEN IN PERSON.', ' NO VIDEO SHOWINGS.', 'NO EXCEPTIONS.', 'UNIT 7 IS IN THE "B" STACK - SUNNY CORNER EXPOSURE!!!!', '$2300/MONTH', '9/1/2022', '"The Federal” located @ 276-278 Hanover Street', 'The "B" Stack offers a Rear Corner Exposure with great sunlight and city views.', 'As you go up, the views of the city only get better.', ' The Junior 1 bedrooms offer a separate kitchen and Living Area.', ' The two rooms are broken up by a large bathroom and closet where the IN UNIT LAUNDRY is located.', 'Enjoy both Central Air & Heat, as well as TV wall mount for your convenience.', 'All Units have Central Air and Laundry in Unit', 'Very Easy to Show in Person.', 'Showings 7 Days a week', 'Please Call or Email Zach Barron for more assistance', '.', 'SALES...', 'Thinking of Buying or Selling??', 'Call today and LETS TALK.', ' I handle Condo & Multi Family Sales throughout the Downtown Boston Area.', '.', 'I mainly cover the North End, Beacon Hill, Back Bay, Downtown/Fidi, Seaport, South Boston, Charlestown & West End.', '.', 'Please contact Zach to Discuss ALL AVAILABILITY including OFF MARKET LISTINGS.', 'Please Call, Text, Email, or DM', 'Zach Barron', 'Core Property Group', 'Vice President', '617-939-1078', 'Instagram: @real_estate_barron', 'zbarron <URL>', '*** BROKERS:', 'THIS LISTING IS NOT A CO-BROKE ***', 'All Information should be verified.', 'The apartments advertised may be rented.', 'Core Property Group is an "Equal Housing Opportunity" Real Estate Company.']
